Package model

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.TileContent
        • model.Tower
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TowerA, TowerB, TowerC

    public abstract class Tower
extends TileContent
    Models a tower to be places onto a GameMap and that will attack the enemies. Each tower has different attributes and cost different amounts of gold.

      • attack

        public Enemy attack​()
        attacks a single enemy. if an enemy has been killed, return that enemy. applies this towers effect on the enemy for 2 moves.
        Returns:
        an enemy which been killed by this tower
